law.catch_line: Consistency of permits with Kentucky River Authority's administrative regulations and plans.
law.text: Permits issued by the cabinet pursuant to the provisions of KRS Chapters 151, 146, or 224 shall be consistent with the administrative regulations promulgated by the Kentucky River Authority, and the long-range water resource plan and drought response plans developed by the authority.
law.history: Created 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 453, sec. 3, effective July 14, 1992.
